alert.note: Alert for Clay; Owen; Putnam; Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 11:45PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Vigo, northeastern Sullivan, Clay, northwestern Owen and southwestern Putnam Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1145 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sullivan, or 18 miles south of Terre Haute, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Vigo, northeastern Sullivan, Clay, northwestern Owen and southwestern Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Hymera, Fairbanks, Coal City, Bowling Green, Shelburn, Clay City, Farmersburg, Patricksburg, Coalmont and Cory. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 23 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
